titles.title: ANTI-Drugs Act
ANTI-Drugs Act
Assisting Narcotics and Trafficking officers in Interdicting Drugs Act
To statutorily establish Operation Stonegarden, through which eligible law enforcement agencies shall be awarded grants for border security enhancement.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary, and in addition to the Committees on Homeland Security, and Oversight and Accountability, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
